basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 50013 (MIC=48 µg/ml), Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 51302 (MIC=48 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27553 (MIC=64 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=40 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23631 (MIC=24 µg/ml), Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619 (MIC=56 µg/ml).
